Action.Name: Index
Action.Title: 列表

Command.Name: 列表页面
Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command:
<IndexPageActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html">
  <Page SettingType="IndexPage">
    <ContentHeader><script type="text/javascript">
function showDlgByType()
{
  var row= $("#datagrid").datagrid('getSelected');
var type=row["ProductType"]
if(type!="套餐组合类")
{
  showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid','修改','/Page/P01064/Edit',400,300)
}
else
{
    showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid','修改','/Page/P01064/EditSubProduct',400,300)
}
}

function showActDlg_DGItemActDlgByType()
{
  var row= $("#datagrid").datagrid('getSelected');
var type=row["ProductType"]
if(type!="套餐组合类")
{
showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid','查看','/Page/P01064/Detail',400,300)
}
else
{
showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid','查看','/Page/P01064/DetailSubProduct',400,300)
}
}
</script></ContentHeader>
    <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="toolbar-panel" PageID="P01064">
      <Buttons>
        <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-search" Class="easyui-linkbutton normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-search',plain:true" Title="检索" ActionValue="2" Action="showActDlg('检索','/Page/P01064/Search',400,300)" />
        <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-detail" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-detail',plain:true" Title="查看" ActionValue="4" Action=" showActDlg_DGItemActDlgByType()" />
        <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-create" Class="easyui-linkbutton normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-add',plain:true" Title="新增" ActionValue="8" Action="showActDlg('新增','/Page/P01064/Create',400,300)" />
        <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-edit" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-edit',plain:true" Title="修改" ActionValue="16" Action="showDlgByType()" />
        <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-delete" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolmultiple normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel',plain:true" Title="删除" ActionValue="32" Action="showActDlg_DGItemsConfirm('datagrid','删除','确认删除选择项？','/Page/P01064/Delete',400,300)" />
        <UIButton Tag="a" Class="easyui-linkbutton normal-button toolradio hide_ProductTypeID_P024" Options="plain:true" Title="价格设定" ActionValue="256" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid','价格设定','/Page/P01064/PriceSet',400,300)" />
        <UIButton Tag="a" Class="easyui-linkbutton normal-button" Options="plain:true" Title="新增套餐" ActionValue="64" Action="showActDlg('新增套餐','/Page/P01064/Addcombo',400,300)" />
        <UIButton Tag="a" Class="easyui-linkbutton normal-button toolradio" Options="plain:true" Title="界面设定" ActionValue="128" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid','界面设定','/Page/P01064/ProductUI',400,300)" />
      </Buttons>
    </ToolBar>
    <DataGrid Tag="table" ID="datagrid" Class="easyui-datagrid" Options="url:'/Page/P01064/Query',fitColumns:true,fit:true,pagination: true,rownumbers: true,nowrap: true,striped: true,collapsible: false,resizable:true,onClickRow:oncheckstate,onSelect:oncheckstate,onCheck:oncheckstate,onCheckAll:oncheckstate,onUncheckAll:oncheckstate,onUncheck:oncheckstate,onUnselect:oncheckstate" Key="ProductID">
      <Column Title="产品编号" FieldName="ID" IsCheckBox="true" />
      <Column Title="产品编号" FieldName="ProductID" />
      <Column Title="产品名称" FieldName="ProductName" />
      <Column Title="产品类型" FieldName="ProductType" />
      <Column HAlign="Right" Title="产品单价" FieldName="UnitPrice" />
      <Column Title="状态" FieldName="PState" />
      <Column Title="备注" FieldName="Remark" />
    </DataGrid>
  </Page>
</IndexPageActionCommand>

Action.Name: Search
Action.Title: 检索

Command.Name: 检索页面
Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command: <EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html"> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog"> <TableLayout /> <Fields> <Field Title="产品名称" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="ProductName" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Options="invalidMessage:'产品名称不能大于50',validType:'length[0,50]'" Binding="ProductName" IsRequired="false" Length="50" /> </Field> <Field Title="产品类型" FieldType="ComboTree"> <ComboTree Tag="input" Name="ProductTypeID" Class="edit-input easyui-combotree" Options="editable:false" IsRequired="false" Length="4" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetProductTypeParentID&resultformat=jsontree&root=P001&pid=ParentID&id=ProductTypeID&text=ProductType" DisplayMember="ProductType" ValueMember="ProductTypeID" IsAutoHeight="false" /> </Field> </Fields> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01064"> <Buttons> <UIButton ID="btn-query" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-ok'" Title="确定" ActionValue="2" Action="submitAct_DGReplace('dataform','/Page/P01064/Query','datagrid')" /> <UIButton ID="btn-cancel" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="取消" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>

Action.Name: Query
Action.Title: 检索
Action.Command: <ScalarCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="执行查询" GroupName="业务模块" TableName="bi_Product" CommandName="QueryCount" SqlType="Scalar"> <Parameter Name="ProductName" Path="Request[ProductName]" Type="Parameter" Converter="CreateSearchField" ConverterParameter="ProductName,0,M" /> <Parameter Name="ProductTypeID" Path="Request[ProductTypeID]" Type="Parameter" Converter="CreateSearchField" ConverterParameter="ProductTypeID,0,M" /> </ScalarCommand>

Command.Name: 执行查询
Command.Description: 本查询的结果值为JSON，参数路径为Results[执行查询].Json

Action.Command: <QueryJsonCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="搜索结果" GroupName="业务模块" TableName="bi_Product" CommandName="QueryPage" SqlType="QueryJson"> <Parameter Name="ProductName" Path="Request[ProductName]" Type="Parameter" Converter="CreateSearchField" ConverterParameter="ProductName,0,M" /> <Parameter Name="ProductTypeID" Path="Request[ProductTypeID]" Type="Parameter" Converter="CreateSearchField" ConverterParameter="ProductTypeID,0,M" /> <Parameter Name="OrderBy" Path="Request[OrderBy]" Type="Const" DefaultValue="M.ModifiedTime " /> <Parameter Name="Page" Path="Request[Page]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Rows" Path="Request[Rows]" Type="Parameter" /> </QueryJsonCommand>

<JsonActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="application/json"> <Parameter Name="rows" Path="Results[执行查询].Json" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="HasError" Path="Results[执行查询].IsError" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ErrorMessage" Path="Results[执行查询].ErrorMessage" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="total" Path="Results[查询总数].Value" Type="Parameter" /> </JsonActionCommand>

Action.Name: Detail
Action.Title: 查看
Action.Command: <QueryCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="查看产品" GroupName="业务模块" TableName="bi_Product" CommandName="GetDetail"> <Parameter Name="ProductID" Path="Request[ID]" Type="Parameter" /> </QueryCommand>

Action.Command: <QueryJsonCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="新增结果" GroupName="业务模块" TableName="bi_Product" CommandName="Add" SqlType="QueryJson"> <Parameter Name="CreatedUser" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="CreatedTime" Path="CurrentDateTime" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedUser" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedTime" Path="CurrentDateTime" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="ProductID" Path="SerialCode" Type="SystemParameter" DefaultValue="ProductName,P,8" /> <Parameter Name="ProductName" Path="Request[ProductName]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="ProductTypeID" Path="Request[ProductTypeID]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="UnitPrice" Path="Request[UnitPrice]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="CostPrice" Path="Request[CostPrice]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="TaxRate" Path="Request[TaxRate]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="RebateRate" Path="Request[RebateRate]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="Discount" Path="Request[Discount]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="SupplierID" Path="Request[SupplierID]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="PState" Path="Request[PState]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="Remark" Path="Request[Remark]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="SortID" Path="Request[SortID]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="IsBiOrder" Path="Request[IsBiOrder]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" DefaultValue="0" /> <Parameter Name="IsSeOrder" Path="Request[IsSeOrder]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" DefaultValue="0" /> <Parameter Name="Unit" Path="Request[Unit]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="PriceID" Path="SerialCode" Type="SystemParameter" DefaultValue="ProductPrice,PP,8" /> <Parameter Name="StartDate" Path="Request[StartDate]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="EndDate" Path="Request[EndDate]" Type="Parameter" /> </QueryJsonCommand>

<JsonActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="application/json"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="Results[执行新增].Json" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="HasError" Path="Results[执行新增].IsError" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ErrorMessage" Path="Results[执行新增].ErrorMessage" Type="Parameter" /> </JsonActionCommand>

Action.Name: GetProductUI
Action.Title: 获取产品界面设定信息
Action.Command: <QueryJsonCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="返回信息" GroupName="业务模块" TableName="bi_Product" CommandName="GetProductUI" SqlType="QueryJson"> <Parameter Name="ProductID" Path="Request[ProductID]" Type="Parameter" /> </QueryJsonCommand>

<ReturnActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="appplication/json"> <Parameter Name="json" Path="LastResult.Json" Type="Parameter" /> </ReturnActionCommand>

Action.Name: AddproductUI
Action.Title: 新增产品下单界面设定
Action.Command: <QueryJsonCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="返回" GroupName="业务模块" TableName="bi_ProductUI" CommandName="Add" SqlType="QueryJson"> <Parameter Name="ProductID" Path="Request[ProductID]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="CreatedUser" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="CreatedTime" Path="CurrentDateTime" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedUser" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedTime" Path="CurrentDateTime" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="PUIISD" Path="Request[PUIISD]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ItemCol" Path="Request[ItemCol]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ItemSort" Path="Request[ItemSort]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ItemName" Path="Request[ItemName]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="IsRequired" Path="Request[IsRequired]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Remark" Path="Request[Remark]" Type="Parameter" /> </QueryJsonCommand>

<JsonActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="application/json"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="Results[新增].Json" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="HasError" Path="Results[新增].IsError" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ErrorMessage" Path="Results[新增].ErrorMessage" Type="Parameter" /> </JsonActionCommand>

Action.Name: PriceSet
Action.Title: 价格设定
Action.Command: <QueryCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="价格设定" GroupName="业务模块" TableName="bi_Product" CommandName="GetDetail"> <Parameter Name="ProductID" Path="Request[ID]" Type="Parameter" /> </QueryCommand>

<RazorContentActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html" TemplateFile="\Product\PriceSet.cshtml" SettingType="EditDialog"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="LastResult.Item" Type="Parameter" /> </RazorContentActionCommand>

Action.Name: UpdatePrice
Action.Title: 更新价格信息
Action.Command: <QueryCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="返回数据" GroupName="业务模块" TableName="bi_Product" CommandName="UpdatePrice"> <Parameter Name="DeleteCheck" Path="Request[DeleteCheck]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="PriceID" Path="Request[PriceID]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ProductID" Path="Request[ProductID]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="UnitPrice" Path="Request[UnitPrice]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="CostPrice" Path="Request[CostPrice]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="TaxRate" Path="Request[TaxRate]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="RebateRate" Path="Request[RebateRate]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="Discount" Path="Request[Discount]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="StartDate" Path="Request[StartDate]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="EndDate" Path="Request[EndDate]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="Remark" Path="Request[Remark]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedUser" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedTime" Path="CurrentDateTime" Type="SystemParameter" /> </QueryCommand>

<JsonActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="application/json"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="Results[更新价格信息].Items" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="HasError" Path="Results[更新价格信息].IsError" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ErrorMessage" Path="Results[更新价格信息].ErrorMessage" Type="Parameter" /> </JsonActionCommand>
